name: Garen
title: The Might of Demacia
lore: A proud and noble warrior, Garen fights as one of the Dauntless Vanguard. He is popular among his fellows, and respected well enough by his enemies—not least as a scion of the prestigious Crownguard family, entrusted with defending Demacia and its ideals. Clad in magic-resistant armor and bearing a mighty broadsword, Garen stands ready to confront mages and sorcerers on the field of battle, in a veritable whirlwind of righteous steel.
blurb: A proud and noble warrior, Garen fights as one of the Dauntless Vanguard. He is popular among his fellows, and respected well enough by his enemies—not least as a scion of the prestigious Crownguard family, entrusted with defending Demacia and its...
allytips: Garen's regeneration greatly increases if he can avoid receiving damage for several seconds.
Judgment deals maximum damage when only hitting a single target. For effective trading, try to position such that only the enemy champion is hit.
Garen is only constrained by cooldowns, making items such as Black Cleaver very effective for him.
enemytips: Stack armor items to lower the large amount of physical damage that Garen deals out.
Try to run away from Garen as your health gets lower, as he can execute you quickly with Demacian Justice.
Be careful about attacking Garen in brush. It often will lead to taking full damage from Judgment.
Judgment deals maximum damage when only hitting a single target. If getting out of its radius isn't possible, move through allied minions to reduce damage taken.

riot_spells.name: Decisive Strike
riot_spells.description: Garen gains a burst of movement speed, breaking free of all slows affecting him. His next attack strikes a vital area of his foe, dealing bonus damage and silencing them.
riot_spells.tooltip:
Garen breaks free from all slows affecting him, and gains {{ movementspeedamount*100 }}% movement speed for {{ movementspeedduration }} seconds.

His next basic attack within {{ attackwindow }} seconds deals {{ totaldamage }} physical damage and silences his target for {{ silenceduration }} seconds.

riot_spells.name: Courage
riot_spells.description: Garen passively increases his armor and magic resist by killing enemies. He may also activate this ability to give him a shield and tenacity for a brief moment followed by a lesser amount of damage reduction for a longer duration.
riot_spells.tooltip:
Passive: Killing units permanently grants {{ resistgainonkill }} armor and magic resist, up to a maximum of {{ resistmax }}. Current Bonus: {{ f1 }}

Active: Garen steels his courage for {{ drduration }} seconds, reducing all incoming damage by {{ drpercent*100 }}%. For the first {{ upfrontduration }} seconds, he also gains a shield that blocks {{ totalshield }} damage and {{ upfronttenacity*100 }}% Tenacity.

riot_spells.name: Judgment
riot_spells.description: Garen rapidly spins his sword around his body, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies.
riot_spells.tooltip:
Garen rapidly spins his sword around his body for {{ duration }} seconds, dealing {{ totaldamage }} physical damage {{ f1 }} times, increased to {{ totaldamagenearest }} to the nearest enemy. (Attack speed from items and levels increases the number of strikes)

Enemy champions hit by {{ stackstoshred }} spins lose {{ shredamount*100 }}% of their armor for {{ shredduration }} seconds.

riot_spells.name: Demacian Justice
riot_spells.description: Garen calls upon the might of Demacia to attempt to execute an enemy champion.
riot_spells.tooltip: Garen calls upon the might of Demacia to attempt to execute an enemy champion, dealing true damage equal to {{ basedamage }} plus {{ executedamage*100 }}% of the target's missing health.

riot_passive.name: Perseverance
riot_passive.description: If Garen has not recently been struck by damage or enemy abilities, he regenerates a percentage of his total health each second.

i1.name: Perseverance
i1.blurb: If Garen has not recently been struck by damage or enemy abilities, he regenerates a percentage of his total health each second. Minion damage does not stop Perseverance.
i1.description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Garen''' {{sti|healing|restores|link=true}}{{ft|{{as|{{pp2|key=%|1.5+0.2*(x-1) for 6;then + 0.8*x for 7; then + 0.4*x|formula=1.3%+0.2% per level up to level 6, then+0.8% up to level 13, then+0.4%}} of his '''maximum''' health}} every 5 seconds|{{as|{{pp2|key=%|(1.5+0.2*(x-1))/10 for 6;then + 0.8/10*x for 7; then + 0.4/10*x|formula=0.13%+0.02% per level up to level 6, then+0.08% up to level 13, then+0.04%}} of his '''maximum''' health}} every {{fd|0.5}} seconds}}.
i1.description2: ''Perseverance'' is {{tip|interrupt|interrupted}} for 7 seconds if '''Garen''' takes damage from epic {{tip|monster|monsters}}, {{tip|turret|turrets}}, or {{tip|champion|champions}}, or if he is hit by an enemy [[Champion ability|ability]].

q1.name: Decisive Strike
q1.blurb: Garen gains a burst of movement speed, breaking free of all slows affecting him. His next attack strikes a vital area of his foe, dealing bonus damage and silencing them.
q1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Garen''' {{tip|cleanse|cleanses}} himself of all {{tip|slow|slows}} and gains {{sti|ms|{{as|30% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for a few seconds.
q1.description2: Additionally, '''Garen's''' next [[basic attack]] within {{fd|4.5}} seconds {{tip|lunge|lunges}} him towards the target, dealing {{tip|physical damage|{{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}}} and {{tip|silence|silencing}} the target for {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
q1.notes:
* ''Decisive Strike'' does not interrupt ''Garen's'' previous orders.
* The enhanced attack will apply other [[on-hit effect]]s and can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} as normal (the bonus damage does not).
** The bonus damage will also apply {{sti|life steal}}.
** The bonus damage is applied to structures.
* If the {{tip|slow}} has a {{tip|cripple}} effect within it, it will also be removed together with the ''slow''.
** For example, it will remove {{tip|cripple}} from {{cai|Wither|Nasus}}, but not from {{cai|Ground Slam|Malphite}}.
** ''Decisive Strike'' will remove {{tip|slow}} from {{si|Exhaust}}, but not the damage reduction, for it being two separate effects within one summoner spell.
** It will remove the slow from {{bi|Crest of Cinders|Red Buff}}, but not the damage over time.
* ''Decisive Strike'' does not protect ''Garen'' from re-application of {{tip|slow|slows}} on him.
** [[Area of effect]] {{tip|slow|slows}} (like {{cai|Pillar of Ice|Trundle}}) are re-applied immediately after removing if ''Garen'' stays in the corresponding area.

w1.name: Courage
w1.blurb: Garen passively increases his armor and magic resist by killing enemies. He may also activate this ability to give him a huge burst of Tenacity and damage reduction for a brief moment followed by a lesser amount of damage reduction for a longer duration.
w1.description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Garen''' permanently gains {{sti|armor|{{as|{{fd|0.25}} '''bonus''' armor}}}} and {{sti|mr|{{as|{{fd|0.25}} '''bonus''' magic resistance}}}} every time he kills an enemy, up to a maximum of 30 '''bonus''' resistances at 120 unit kills.
w1.description2: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Garen''' reduces incoming damage by 30% for a few seconds. For the first {{fd|0.75}} seconds, '''Garen''' is additionally {{sti|shield|shielded|link=true}} for {{as|10% of his '''maximum''' health}} and gains 60% {{sti|tenacity|link=true}}.
w1.notes:
* ''Courage'' does not interrupt '''Garen's''' previous orders.
* ''Courage's'' bonus resistances are only gained when it is ranked up at least once, but ''Courage's'' passive is retroactive.
* Any enemy unit counts towards ''Courage's'' bonus resistances: champions, minions, monsters (including epic ones), [[Champion summoned units|summoned units]] and turrets. The bonus is equal in all these cases.
* ''Courage'' will only grant bonus resistances from units killed by '''Garen''' himself. {{ii|Eye of the Herald}}, {{ii|Zz'Rot Portal}} and {{ii|Relic Shield|Spoils of War}} of allies do not count.

e1.name: Judgment
e1.blurb: Garen performs a dance of death with his sword, dealing damage around him for the duration and shredding the armor of enemy champions hit.
e1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Garen''' rapidly {{ct|channel|spins|attack=false|cast=[[File:Decisive_Strike.png|20px|link=Garen#Decisive_Strike]] [[Garen#Decisive_Strike|Decisive Strike]] and [[File:Courage.png|20px|link=Garen#Courage]] [[Garen#Courage|Courage]] are usable. [[File:Demacian_Justice.png|20px|link=Garen#Demacian_Justice]] [[Garen#Demacian_Justice|Demacian Justice]] interrupts.|move=true|items=true|consume=true|spells=true,true,true,false,true|interrupts=death}} his sword around his body {{as|{{pp2|key1=%|type='''bonus''' attack speed|6+x;...;∞|(20*x)-20;...;∞|formula=7{{plus}}1 per 20% '''bonus''' attack speed. ''The amount of spins updates every 20% attack speed. This only considers attack speed from [[item]]s and [[growth|growth (per level)]].''}}|as}} times over 3 seconds, dealing {{as|physical damage}} with each spin to nearby enemies. ''Judgment'' can {{tip|critical strike|{{as|critically strike}}}} for {{as|{{critical damage|50|100|melee}} '''bonus''' physical damage}}.
e1.leveling: {{st|Physical Damage Per Spin|{{ap|4 to 20}} (+ {{pp2|0.8*(x-1) for 9;then + 0.2*x|formula=0.8 per level until lvl 9, then+0.2 per level}}) {{as|(+ {{ap|32 to 40}}% AD)}}|Nearest Enemy Damage Per Spin|{{ap|4*1.25 to 20*1.25}} (+ {{pp2|0.8*(x-1)*1.25 for 9;then + 0.2*x*1.25}}) {{as|(+ {{ap|32*1.25 to 40*1.25}}% AD)}}}}
e1.description3: The nearest enemy is dealt 25% '''bonus''' damage per spin. Enemy champions hit 6 times have their {{sti|armor penetration|{{as|armor reduced by 25%}}}} for 6 seconds. Hits after the 6th refresh the duration of the debuff.
e1.description5: After 1 second, '''Garen''' can reactivate to cancel it immediately, {{sti|cooldown reduction|reducing|link=true}} its cooldown by its remaining duration.
e1.notes:
* Each spin triggers a stack of {{ri|Conqueror}}.
* Silencing ''Garen'' will prevent him from deactivating the ability early.
* ''Judgment'' cancels ''Garen's'' last movement command upon ending.
* Each spin deals damage simultaneously to all enemies within its range when the spin is completed.
* The spin animation is capped at once per {{fd|0.2}} seconds, but the amount of ticks will keep on scaling.

r1.name: Demacian Justice
r1.blurb: The enemy champion with the most recent kills is the Villain. Garen's attacks deal additional true damage to that champion. Garen can call upon the might of Demacia to deal a finishing blow to an enemy champion that deals damage based upon how much health his target has missing. This damage is true damage against the Villain.
r1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Garen''' gains {{tip|true sight}} of the target champion for 1 second, dealing them {{tip|true damage|{{as|true damage}}}} after a {{fd|0.5}} second delay.
r1.leveling: {{st|True Damage|{{ap|150 to 450}} {{as|(+ {{ap|20 to 30}}% of target's '''missing''' health)}}}}
r1.notes:
* If the target becomes {{tip|untargetable}} the ability will cancel but will not go on cooldown.
* '''Garen''' can {{si|Flash}} during the cast time without cancelling the ability.
